# Usage

RMapDB can be used in the following ways:

1.  To view R-loop-mapping samples and their associated quality information.
2.  To view R-loop regions, the evidence for their existence, and their association with expression.
3.  To access the underlying data-sets through our download links.
4.  To analyze user data and generate an HTML report.

## Samples

To view samples in the RMapDB database, navigate to the "Samples" tab.
